snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel delayed a scheduled eviction to allow Jewish settlers from a house in the volatile West Bank city of Hebron time to argue their legal case for tenancy.
abstract: Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel puts off the prospect of an immediate eviction of settlers from a house in the volatile West Bank city of Hebron, saying they should be given time to argue their legal case for tenancy.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel delayed a scheduled eviction to allow Jewish settlers from a house in the volatile West Bank city of Hebron time to argue their legal case for tenancy.

headline.seo: Israeli Leader Puts Off Evicting Settlers From Hebron House
headline.main: Netanyahu Slows Eviction of Settlers From a House
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Slows Eviction Of Settlers From a House
